metadata.title: CVE-2022-48767 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ceph:properly put ceph_string reference after async create attempt The referenceacquired by try_prep_async_create is currently leaked. Ensure we put it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
